vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
father of: Becorath (H1064)
§ Aphiah = "I will make to breathe"
an ancestor of Saul
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞斐亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我會使之呼吸" (意思不明確)
掃羅的祖先 (撒上 9:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚斐亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我会使之呼吸" (意思不明确)
扫罗的祖先 (撒上 9:1)
